#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#define ll unsigned long long int
ll det(ll);
bool fin(ll);
using std::cout;
int main(){
    ll T=0;
    bool ans=false;
    ll N=0;
    
    scanf("%lld",&T);
    
    while(T--)
    {
      scanf("%lld",&N);
      ans = fin(det(N));
      if(ans)
        cout << "1\n";
      else
        cout << "-1\n";
    }
      
    return 0;
   // system("pause");
}

ll det(ll a){
   ll count = 0;
   for(int i=2;i<=a/2;i++)
    if(a%i==0)// && (a%i)%2!=0)
      count++;
    return count;
}

bool fin(ll x){
    if(x%2 != 0 && x>4)
      return true;
    else
      return false;
}
